title: Bidders and Auction Prices
question_text:
An artist frequently sells his oil paintings on an online auction site. He wants to determine if there is a relationship between the number of bidders for his artwork and the final auction price.
Consider the following values for numbers of bidders ($x$) and auction prices ($y$):
x 10 14 2 12 4 8 13
y 1225 944 1245 1711 936 1036 1041
